column4: I don't know anything about ssh-1, that's why i'm asking for help
!paste
Can I get some help with ssh connection ? This is the connection log : http://paste.ubuntu.com/69646/
can you paste with ssh -vv this time? that will be more verbose
It's the ssh -vvv :)
is this the server log or client?
Client. I can't access to server
are you using password auth or public key
I want to use password auth.
you can use that only if the server allows it
Server admin gives me a password, so I think that it allows it... But maybe i'm asking wrong ?
what command are you using to connect?
ssh -vv servrl -1
can you do a ssh -vv user@server-ip-address-or-hostname ?
pastebin the output of that please
http://paste.ubuntu.com/69652/
that isnt making sense. your connection attempt isnt going farther than the key exchange; has this worked before?
It works, but not for me ^^'
before?
before it doesn't xD
im all confused. do this and try again.. run ssh-keygen to generate your keys. delete known_hosts
It doesn't ask me to add it to the knows hosts :/
